definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Compound Iron Fertilizers had significant effects on rectifying peanuts chlorosis caused by iron deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 復混鐵肥土施矯治石灰性土壤花生缺鐵黃化效果顯著。
石灰可以在許多種土壤中找到。

sentences.english: The water in this area comes from limestone cliffs and is crystal clear.
sentences.chinese: 那裏的水從石灰岩裏留出來，特別清澈。

sentences.english: The Calcium Oxide is used to mix oxygen with the molten steel.
sentences.chinese: 這些生石灰是用來將氧混合在熔化的鋼水中。

sentences.english: Mix lime juice with ground drumstick pods and leaves.
sentences.chinese: 混合石灰汁與地面鼓槌吊艙和葉片。

sentences.english: There are light passages, narrow ones in all different depth, like underground tunnels in limestone.
sentences.chinese: 有寬有窄，形態各異，就像是石灰岩的地下隧道。

sentences.english: Do add lime, small amounts of wood ashes or crushed eggshells to the compost pile.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在堆肥中加入石灰，少量的木灰和碎蛋殼。

sentences.english: Lime water may be bought at any druggist's, or easily prepared at home.
sentences.chinese: 石灰水可從藥店購得，不過在家裏配製也很容易。

sentences.english: Madagascar's limestone towers are a haven for strange species.
sentences.chinese: 馬達加斯加的那些石灰石塔是奇異物種的天堂。

sentences.english: The dissipated sulfur dioxide was absorbed by the lime cream and applied for preparation of the calcium hydrogen sulfite.
sentences.chinese: 放出的二氧化硫經石灰乳吸收用來製備亞硫酸氫鈣。

sentences.english: In parts of Saint Emilion the gravel lies on limestone base.
sentences.chinese: 部分聖愛米濃產區砂礫層都平鋪於石灰石土層上。

sentences.english: It contains water , hydrated lime , a tree protectant and red food color .
sentences.chinese: 它包含了水，石灰，樹木保護劑和食用紅色素。

sentences.english: For limestone no stick-slip was observed.
sentences.chinese: 石灰岩實驗未觀察到粘滑現象。

sentences.english: The lime nitrification device is one set of core equipment in the lime-milk preparation system.
sentences.chinese: 石灰硝化裝置是石灰乳製備系統的核心設備之一。

sentences.english: The lime nitrification device is one set of core equipment in the lime-milk preparation system.
sentences.chinese: 石灰硝化裝置是石灰乳製備系統的核心設備之一。

sentences.english: I'ii have my little house whitewashed tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天我找人用石灰水粉刷一下小屋。

definition: tung oil, from the Japanese wood-oil tree Aleurites cordata, used in making lacquer
